name: Bird's Eye View
description:
a peaceful flight over some mountains

an half-finished game made for the Games Made Quick jam. no scoring made it in so it's all vibes

inspired by Superflight

didn't get to everything i wanted because i spent 20 hours on these mediocre flight physics

other things i learned:

  • unity terrain
  • unity post-processing
  • how to add too many trees and tank performance
  • blender -> unity importing
  • more advanced blender modeling
  • simple coloring/texturing in blender
  • realistic flight physics that i did not use
  • still not quaternions lol
